name: JWORG®
0:
”Alexa, open jw.org”
”Alexa, read this week's Bible reading from jw.org”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: j. w. dot org
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Play selected content from jw.org and JW Broadcasting® using the jw.org skill for Amazon Alexa.

Your command must include the skill name jw.org either before or after the description of what you want to play. For example, "Alexa, play original songs from jw.org," or "Alexa, ask jw.org to play original songs." Below are some examples of what you can ask Alexa to play.

Bible

Alexa, play Genesis from jw.org
Alexa, play Matthew chapter 5 from jw.org
Alexa, play Romans chapter 15 verse 4 from jw.org

Music

Alexa, play original songs from jw.org
Alexa, play Kingdom songs from jw.org
Alexa, play Song 38 from jw.org

Meetings

Alexa, read this week's Bible reading from jw.org
Alexa, read this week's Watchtower Study from jw.org
Alexa, read this week's Congregation Bible Study from jw.org

Additional Features

Alexa, read the daily text from jw.org
Alexa, play the latest morning worship from jw.org
Alexa, play dramas from jw.org
Alexa, play the broadcast from jw.org

Play Content in a Different Language

Alexa, read this week's Watchtower Study in Russian from jw.org
Alexa, read this week's Congregation Bible Study in Tagalog from jw.org
Alexa, play original songs in Korean from jw.org
Alexa, play the latest morning worship in Hindi from jw.org

To learn more about the Bible and Jehovah's Witnesses, visit our official website at www.jw.org. For more information about the jw.org skill for Amazon Alexa, look under Help > Using JW.ORG.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
